title: Help me please
body: This started happening last night, I am in the champion select and the timer hits 0 and the client pops up with the reconnect button.I can press it but it doesn't work.Because of the bug i got leaver busters on both of my accounts.Please help I can't play the game

replies.body: It sucks to hear you got a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) as a result.  :(  This issue can happen if your network is blocking you from transitioning to the game server.  You should stick to custom games to troubleshoot for now, and run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.
Today came a small update to lol and now i am able to play again :D all sorted out !!
Thanks for the feedback I will try to see if there are any connection issues, if something happenes i will post on here
